analysis: Market analysis indicates positive momentum favoring buyers. RSI at 28.95 signals oversold conditions, potential reversal opportunity. Money Flow Index at 28.87 suggests balanced volume distribution. MACD showing trend transition, awaiting confirmation. Price maintaining above Bollinger middle band, uptrend intact. Price action mixed with conflicting signals from trend indicators. Ichimoku cloud analysis supports bullish bias. Stochastic at 16.99 signals potential reversal from oversold levels.

indicator_insights.rsi: Deeply oversold at 28.9, strong reversal potential. Buyers may step in soon.
indicator_insights.mfi: Balanced volume flow at 28.9, institutional activity moderate.
indicator_insights.stochastic: Extreme oversold at 17.0, bullish divergence watch active.
indicator_insights.macd: Bearish crossover above zero. Profit-taking phase, trend weakening.

indicator_insights.moving_average: Price 0.01% above MA. Uptrend confirmed, MA acting as dynamic support.
indicator_insights.parabolic_sar: SAR positioned above price at 156.17800. Downtrend active, short positions favored.
indicator_insights.ichimoku: Price above cloud components. Strong bullish structure, all systems aligned for longs.
